vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Sa.1.1;
son of: Zuph (H6689);
father of: Elihu (H0453); also called Nahath at 1Ch.6.26; Toah at 1Ch.6.34;
§ Tohu = "lowly"
Levite, son of Zuph, father of Elihu, and great grandfather of Samuel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Suf; ancestro de Samuel; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
託戶 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "低下"
利未人蘇弗的兒子, 以利戶的父親, 撒母耳的高祖父 #撒上 1:1|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
托户 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "低下"
利未人苏弗的儿子, 以利户的父亲, 撒母耳的高祖父 #撒上 1:1|
